## QuerySort.set() method

Set one or more values to sort the query.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(value: string, order?: SortOrder): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | <code>string</code> | Field name to sort the query. |
|  order | <code>SortOrder</code> | Order of the sorting. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

the new length of the list of sortings.
